pages.name: Fire Starters
pages.text: Pyres can be lit through a variety of devices, including the ones shown above. If the item can be damaged, the act of starting the ritual will damage it.$(br2)Fire starters can be configured through the entry $(bold)pyreFireStarters$() in the ore dictionary.

Additionally, a rudimentary $(l:crafting/firestarter)fire-starter$() can be crafted from two sticks.$(br2)You must channel the device on the Pyre for several seconds to start it, after which point the device is consumed.

pages.title: Automation
pages.text: The pyre will automatically light itself if it finds fire in the area immediately around it. $(l:rituals/automation)Please see the section on Automation$() for more precise details.
